message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $150. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $100. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal. While I'm willing to be flexible, $100 is a bit low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $125? I'm confident you'll still find this a good value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $110. This seems to be a fair compromise between our previous offers.
